participant_1.name: Lila Thompson
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and hardworking, Lila is passionate about nature and enjoys the freedom of riding her horses.
participant_1.background: i like to ride horses. i help tend the fields. i've three arabian horses. i like to listen to rock music while working.

participant_2.name: Ethan Parker
participant_2.personality: Ethan is creative and introspective, often finding solace in gardening and hands-on tasks.
participant_2.background: i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. i just got a job working in a gas station. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening.
